question:
Consider the following statements about the NATRIP Project:
  1. The project aims to adopt best practices for the road safety and environmental protection
  2. The project aims to bring the safety standards of Indian vehicles in line with the UN Brasilia resolution
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
Both are correct statements
The National Automotive Testing and R&D Infrastructure Project (NATRIP) project aims to adopt best practises for the road safety and environmental protection. The project aims to make the safety standards of Indian vehicles in line with UN Brasilia resolution.
